Message.Title: The End of Online Retailers
Message.Msg: The rise of consumers purchasing online and online advertising will make online retailers obsolete. Online consumer purchasing is a boom for producers, manufacturers and service providers, and a bust for online retailers. Producers and manufactures can better control their destiny and capture more of online consumer dollar by dealing directly with the consumer. With the internet, online retailers offer little to a producers, manufacturers or service providers. Online retailers success is tied to selling volume not promotion of features, benefits or a brand. Producers, manufacturers and service providers can rapidly respond to competitive pricing or capture more margin when they have the competitive advantage.

Message.Title: Doctors and Guns
Message.Msg: Doctors: (A) The number of doctors in the US is approx. 700,000 (B) Accidental deaths caused by physicians per year are 120,000 (C) Accidental deaths per physician is almost 17.14% Statistics : courtesy of the US Dept. of Health & Human Services Guns: (A) The number of gun owners in the US is 80,000,000 (yes that's 80 million) (B) The number of accidental gun deaths per year, all age groups, is 1,500. (C) The number of accidental deaths per gun owner is 0.001875% Statistics: courtesy of the FBI So statistically, doctors are approximately 9,000 times more dangerous than gun owners. Remember, guns don't kill people, doctors do. FACT: NOT EVERYONE HAS A GUN, BUT ALMOST EVERYONE HAS A DOCTOR. Please alert your friends to this alarming threat. We should ban doctors before this gets completely out of hand! Out of concern for the public at large, I have withheld statistics on lawyers for fear the shock would cause people to panic and seek medical attention!

Message.Title: here is a TRUE STORY , Im not kidding
Message.Msg: I own a million dollar house (was a million now about 600k) I owe 250k left on it never missed a payment and pay threee times my mortgage for the last three years I made 1.3 million 2012 I made 1.1 million in 2011 I made 800k in 2010 I have had the same job for 16 years never had credit issues My devolepment has some lots for sale I bought two lots cash 25 k each I wanted to build one I called BOA WELL FARGO (MY BANK) CITI AND A FEW OTHERS to get a construction load the contruction load I wanted was 275k just a nice pool home I told them I wanted to put 60k DOWN and finance the rest they said NO can you beleive that? THEY SAID i CANT BUY AN investment property unless I put down 30+ percent and the interewst rate would be 4.9% and I had to put like 12-15 k down closing I am serious ALL MAJOR BANKS told me NO I could not build an investment house now I understand why they said this but they LOAN TO PEOPLE who got us in this mess and then NOT LOAN to the people who are worthy of it LIKE ME , my credit score is 740 ish I have told my story to a few of my florida polititions and NOTHING gets done HOW CAN THEY TELL ME NO Im the guy you want to loan money to I offered 60k down and they said NO Of course I could put another 30+k down like they wanted but out of princpal I litterally told them to go to hell till this day my wife and I and the people around me that I know cant beleive that EVERY MAJOR bank told me NO however, they are letting our devolement get run over by first time home buyers who can put down 3% and run dopwn our neighborhood this is why this world is in trouble and we are turning into a THIRD WORLD COUNTRY I am losing hope and feel like this is a sick joke being played on the american people THIS IS AMERICA not, MEXICO, BRAZIL, ISREAL , CHINA, COLUMBIA, JAPAN, IRAN ECT.. ECT.. we have different standards here get all the people who dont beleive in AMERICA the F OUT This is getting stupid now and we need to do something about it

Message.Title: Obama won 63% of vote for those making less than $30K - If 50% he would have lost by 2 million votes
Message.Msg: There's no question that the uneducated, heavily gov't dependent citizens that make less than $30,000 a year were responsible for Obama being re-elected. The following is from N.Y. Times: "“Obama’s vote percentage declines in straight line fashion as income rises. He got 63 percent of the votes of Americans making less than $30,000 and 57 percent of those making between $30,000 and $50,000. Above $50,000, the Other America kicks in. Romney won 53 percent of the votes of Americans making between $50,000 and $100,000 and 54 percent of the votes of Americans making above $100,000.” Had Obama only received 50% of the of the poor uneducated vote he would have lost the election by 2 million votes. Obama won 95% of the black vote as result of racism, and large % of the single women under 30 who believe the gov't should pay for their birth control as well as abortions if they are too stupid to use contraceptives. The Republicans didn't get many votes from hispanics, and even fewer from blacks, not because of their stance on illegal immigration - but because poorly educated and lower income minorities are afraid the Republicans will take their welfare away. Democrats measure compassion by how many Americans they can get on welfare, and Obama has certainly made it much easier to get food stamps and disability benefits since he's been president. More on welfare, the more loyal Democratic voters. Pathetic.
